pages.text: $(br)Although very hot,Venus shows proof that the nether is not simply a dimension,but an actual place in our universe.There is clear evidence,Fauna and Flora alike,that prove that the roots of the nether have originated from some place else.

$(br2)Maybe one day,Venus will reveal: either the nether is a parasitic/fungal entity that spreads from one planet to the next,Or the Venus was already a 'nether' and the biomes have died out leaving pockets of material and bit of civilisation as proof that a nether once resided there
